about.title: About Us | Alojamento Ideal
about.description: Discover Alojamento Ideal – modern and cozy apartments across Porto, Póvoa de Varzim, Leça da Palmeira, and Canidelo. Experience the authentic charm of Northern Portugal with comfort, style, and local hospitality.

privacy.pp-p-1: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacy.pp-p-2: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.pp-p-4: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
privacy.pp-p-5: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:
privacy.by-visiting-this-page-on-our-website: By visiting this page on our website:
privacy.if-you-have-any-questions-about-this-pri: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:
privacy.you-are-advised-to-review-this-privacy-p: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacy.we-will-let-you-know-via-email-and-or-a-: We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
privacy.we-may-update-our-privacy-policy-from-ti: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy.we-have-no-control-over-and-assume-no-re: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
privacy.our-service-may-contain-links-to-other-w: Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.
privacy.if-we-need-to-rely-on-consent-as-a-legal: If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information.
privacy.our-service-does-not-address-anyone-unde: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers.
privacy.the-security-of-your-personal-data-is-im: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.protect-the-personal-safety-of-users-of-: Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public
privacy.prevent-or-investigate-possible-wrongdoi: Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
privacy.protect-and-defend-the-rights-or-propert: Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company
privacy.the-company-may-disclose-your-personal-d: The Company may disclose Your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
privacy.under-certain-circumstances-the-company-: Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose Your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).
privacy.if-the-company-is-involved-in-a-merger-a: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before Your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.
privacy.please-note-however-that-we-may-need-to-: Please note, however, that We may need to retain certain information when we have a legal obligation or lawful basis to do so.
privacy.you-may-update-amend-or-delete-your-info: You may update, amend, or delete Your information at any time by signing in to Your Account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage Your personal information. You may also contact Us to request access to, correct, or delete any personal information that You have provided to Us.
privacy.our-service-may-give-you-the-ability-to-: Our Service may give You the ability to delete certain information about You from within the Service.
privacy.you-have-the-right-to-delete-or-request-: You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You.
privacy.the-company-will-take-all-steps-reasonab: The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.
privacy.your-consent-to-this-privacy-policy-foll: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.
privacy.your-information-including-personal-data: Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.
privacy.the-company-will-also-retain-usage-data-: The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.
privacy.the-company-will-retain-your-personal-da: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
privacy.we-may-disclose-your-personal-informatio: : We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.
privacy.when-you-share-personal-information-or-o: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.
privacy.we-may-share-your-information-with-our-b: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
privacy.we-may-share-your-information-with-our-a: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
privacy.we-may-share-or-transfer-your-personal-i: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
privacy.we-may-share-your-personal-information-w: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.
privacy.we-may-share-your-personal-information-i: We may share Your personal information in the following situations:
privacy.we-may-use-your-information-for-other-pu: : We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.
privacy.we-may-use-your-information-to-evaluate-: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred.
privacy.to-attend-and-manage-your-requests-to-us: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.
privacy.with-news-special-offers-and-general-inf: with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.
privacy.to-contact-you-by-email-telephone-calls-: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
privacy.the-development-compliance-and-undertaki: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.
privacy.for-the-performance-of-a-contract: For the performance of a contract:
privacy.to-manage-your-registration-as-a-user-of: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.
privacy.including-to-monitor-the-usage-of-our-se: , including to monitor the usage of our Service.
privacy.to-provide-and-maintain-our-service: To provide and maintain our Service
privacy.the-company-may-use-personal-data-for-th: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:
privacy.for-more-information-about-the-cookies-w: For more information about the cookies we use and your choices regarding cookies, please visit our Cookies Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.
privacy.purpose-these-cookies-allow-us-to-rememb: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.
privacy.purpose-these-cookies-identify-if-users-: Purpose: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies on the Website.
privacy.purpose-these-cookies-are-essential-to-p: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.
privacy.we-use-both-session-and-persistent-cooki: We use both Session and Persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:
privacy.cookies-can-be-and-quot-persistent-and-q: Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on Your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close Your web browser.
privacy.certain-sections-of-our-service-and-our-: Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and verifying system and server integrity).
privacy.a-cookie-is-a-small-file-placed-on-your-: A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.
privacy.we-use-cookies-and-similar-tracking-tech: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include:
privacy.we-may-also-collect-information-that-you: We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.
privacy.when-you-access-the-service-by-or-throug: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacy.usage-data-may-include-information-such-: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacy.usage-data-is-collected-automatically-wh: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.
privacy.while-using-our-service-we-may-ask-you-t: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
privacy.collecting-and-using-your-personal-data: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
privacy.means-the-individual-accessing-or-using-: means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.
privacy.refers-to-alojamento-ideal-accessible-fr: refers to Alojamento Ideal, accessible from
privacy.refers-to-data-collected-automatically-e: refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
privacy.means-any-natural-or-legal-person-who-pr: means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
privacy.is-any-information-that-relates-to-an-id: is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
privacy.means-any-device-that-can-access-the-ser: means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
privacy.are-small-files-that-are-placed-on-your-: are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
privacy.referred-to-as-either-and-quot-the-compa: (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to Relevos Inalcançaveis, Lda, RUA ANTÓNIO RAMALHO 171 4460-241 SENHORA DA HORA.
privacy.means-an-entity-that-controls-is-control: means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.
privacy.means-a-unique-account-created-for-you-t: means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.

contact.we-got-your-message-desc: Thank you for contacting us. Your message has been received and we will be answered shortly. The details of your message are shown below.

cancellation.partial: Cancel before {deadline} for a partial refund.
cancellation.afterPartial: The partial refund window has passed. Only a proportional tax refund applies; all nights are charged in full.
cancellation.p1: Cancel within 48 hours of booking and at least 14 days before check-in to receive a full refund, including taxes.
cancellation.p2: Cancel 14 or more days before check-in (but outside the first 48 hours) or between 7 and 14 days before check-in to receive a 50% refund, including taxes.
cancellation.p3: Cancellations made less than 7 days before check-in are non-refundable, except for a pro-rated refund of taxes.

toast.email-fail: Failed to send email. Please try again.

booking.title: Booking & Reservations
booking.q1: How do I make a reservation?
booking.a1: Choose your property, select check-in and check-out dates, number of guests, and follow the secure booking process on our website.
booking.q2: Do I need to pay in full when booking?
booking.a2: Yes, the total amount (including taxes and fees) is charged at the time of booking to secure your stay.
booking.q3: Can I modify my reservation after booking?
booking.a3: Depending on availability, you may be able to adjust dates or guest details. Please contact us as soon as possible.

cancellation.title: Cancellation & Refunds
cancellation.a1:
• Cancel within 48 hours of booking and at least 14 days before check-in → Full refund
• Cancel 14 or more days before check-in (outside first 48h) → 50% refund
• Cancel between 7–14 days before check-in → 50% refund
• Cancel less than 7 days before check-in → Non-refundable, except for proportional tax refund
cancellation.q2: How long does it take to receive a refund?
cancellation.a2: Refunds are processed immediately after cancellation but may take 5–10 business days to appear on your payment method.

checkin.title: Check-in & Stay
checkin.a1: Most properties offer self check-in with instructions provided before arrival. Some may include a personal welcome.
checkin.q2: What time is check-in and check-out?
checkin.a2: Standard check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is until 11:00 AM, unless otherwise specified.
checkin.a3: Yes, all properties include fresh linens, towels, and basic amenities.

payments.title: Payments & Security
payments.a1: We accept major credit and debit cards, and some properties support digital wallets.
payments.a2: Yes, all transactions are processed with encrypted and secure payment gateways.

support.title: Support
support.q1: What if I have an issue during my stay?
support.a1: You can contact your host directly or reach our 24/7 support team for urgent assistance.
support.q2: How do I contact Alojamento Ideal?
support.a2: Via email, phone, or live chat. Details are available on the 'Contact Us' page.

about.about-desc: Alojamento Ideal is a collection of cozy and thoughtfully designed apartments along Portugal’s North Coast. From the vibrant streets of Porto to the seaside charm of Póvoa de Varzim, Leça da Palmeira, and Canidelo, we create stays that feel like home—comfortable, modern, and rooted in local charm.
about.story-desc: Founded with a passion for hospitality and authentic local living, Alojamento Ideal was created to connect travelers with the best of Northern Portugal. We believe in offering more than just a place to sleep—we provide welcoming spaces where comfort meets culture, and every guest feels at home.
about.where-desc: Whether you’re exploring Porto’s rich history, relaxing by the beaches of Póvoa de Varzim, enjoying the seaside breeze in Leça da Palmeira, or discovering the charm of Canidelo, we have a stay that fits your journey.
about.why-stay-l1: Central and convenient locations in Northern Portugal
about.why-stay-l2: Stylish, modern, and fully equipped apartments
about.why-stay-l3: Clean, welcoming spaces tailored for relaxation
about.ready-part-1: Ready to discover Portugal with us?
about.ready-part-2: Explore our apartments and book your stay today.”
